title: Vintage Gorpcore Polo Sport Ralph Lauren Leather Hiker Boots Brown Tan 13D
listperfectly_description:
Vintage Polo Sport Ralph Lauren leather hiker boots with lug‑sole traction solve slick‑ground footing for size 13D.

Vintage men's Polo Sport Ralph Lauren leather hiking boots in brown/tan/black with duck toe bumper, padded collar, brass eyelets, and an instep strap; rugged gorpcore‑ready outdoor boots built for trail, workwear, and casual wear.

You will receive the following item(s):

- Men's Boots (pair)

Measurements are as follows:

- Size / Fit: US 13 / UK ~12 / EU ~46 (Width D (Reg))
- Outsole length (heel-to-toe): 13.5 in (34.3 cm)
- Outsole width (widest): 4.8 in (12.2 cm)
- Insole length (heel to toe): 12.5 in (31.8 cm)
- Insole width (ball area): 4.3 in (10.9 cm)
- Heel height: 1.5 in (3.8 cm)
- Platform height (forefoot): 0.7 in (1.8 cm)
- Toe box height: 1.5 in (3.8 cm)
- Shaft height (from outsole): 5.5 in (14 cm)
- Shaft opening (circumference): 11 in (27.9 cm)
- Weight (pair): 4.50 lb (2.04 kg)

Photos show condition and measurements; ask if you need a specific angle or detail confirmed.
